body.p: The Board noted that an offset between the hedged item and the hedging instrument is a fundamental principle of the hedge accounting model in IAS 39 and, therefore, the Board considered it critical to maintain this principle. The exception addresses only the uncertainties arising from the reform. Therefore, if an entity is unable to demonstrate that a hedging relationship is expected to be highly effective for other reasons, the entity shall discontinue hedge accounting as required by IAS 39.
